import React, { useState } from 'react' export default function Recoverpassword() { const [matchpass,setmatchpass]= useState() const matchpassword =(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() if(document.getElementById("pass1").value===document.getElementById("pass2")){ setmatchpass("password matched") console.log(matchpass) } } return ( <>

Enter your email address and we'll send you an email with instructions to reset your password.

send email OTP
